mapper.sql: phoneNumber, nickName, isVerified, avatarUrl, sex, college, CreateAt, CreateBy, UpdateAt, UpdateBy
mapper.insert: insert into User () values (#{phoneNumber}, #{nickName}, #{isVerified}, #{avatarUrl}, #{sex}, #{college}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), 'sys')
mapper.update: UPDATE User set nickName = #{nickName}, UpdateAt=now() where ID = #{ID};
Update User set sex = #{sex}, UpdateAt=now() where ID = #{ID};
UPDATE User set college = #{college}, UpdateAt=now() where ID = #{ID};
Update User set avatarUrl = #{avatarUrl}, UpdateAt=now() where ID = #{ID};
